title: Minister Basil Rajapaksa tells The Hindu: INDO LANKA ACCORD NEVER FOR POLICE POWER SHARING
content: Casting fresh light on the Indo-Lanka Accord of 1987 which gave birth to the 13th Amendment to Sri Lanka’s Constitution, Economic Development Minister Basil Rajapaksa told The Hindu newspaper in India that devolving Police powers would actually amount to going against the Accord.
